data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Firewalls are like security guards at the entrance of a building (Internet etc.) who ____ ID ____ of ____, ____ access ____ various ____ of ____ facility ____ to ____ with ____ proper ____. Access to these various parts of the facility is dependent upon the authorization privileges of the security level of the identification shown.
data.partBlankContent: Firewalls are like security guards at the entrance of a building (Internet etc.) who ch___ ID ca___ of indiv______, allo____ access t_ various pa___ of t__ facility on__ to th___ with t__ proper crede______. Access to these various parts of the facility is dependent upon the authorization privileges of the security level of the identification shown.
data.fullContent: Firewalls are like security guards at the entrance of a building (Internet etc.) who check ID cards of individuals, allowing access to various parts of the facility only to those with the proper credentials. Access to these various parts of the facility is dependent upon the authorization privileges of the security level of the identification shown.
data.answer: 防火墙就像建筑物入口处的保安(互联网等)，检查个人的身份证，只允许有适当证件的人进入设施的各个部分。对设施的这些不同部分的访问取决于所示身份的安全级别的授权特权。
